name: dragon-scale-mail-xdmg
prompt: Detailed artifact: dragon-scale-mail-xdmg, pearl, coral, cloud-crystal, pressure-forged metals, inlaid runes with gentle glow (no bloom), include hand or ruler for size context, product-style hero render, clean backdrop, Use aspect and resolution as specified, maintain consistent styling tags, include negative prompts to avoid artifacts.
alt_text: Artifact dragon-scale-mail-xdmg displayed with materials, runes, and scale.
